headline: Permira, Blackstone weigh multi-billion-euro Mobile.de IPO, sources say
summary: Buyout groups Permira and Blackstone are weighing a multi-billion-euro initial public offering of German online auto marketplace Mobile.de, three people with knowledge of the situation said. ...

raw.headline: Permira, Blackstone weigh multi-billion-euro Mobile.de IPO, sources say

headline: Blackstone plans to sell Hotel Investment Partners, Cinco Dias reports
summary: Private equity fund Blackstone is readying the sale of Spain-based Hotel Investment Partners (HIP), which is worth 6.5 billion euros ($6.77 billion), Spanish newspaper Cinco Dias reported on Wednesday, citing several unidentified market sources. HIP owns 73 hotels with 22,000 rooms in Spain, Portugal, Italy and Greece. Blackstone is seeking to divest this year either through the sale of the 65% it owns in HIP or through an initial public offering, Cinco Dias reported.

headline: If I Could Only Retire With 5 Investments Today
summary: When it comes to investing for and in retirement, sometimes simplicity is best. Check out how I would approach retirement with just five investments today.
